edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.screens

Class BaseScreen

  • edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.screens.BaseScreen
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LevelScreen, LevelSelectScreen, LoadingScreen, MainMenuScreen

    public class BaseScreen

    Convenient base class for all Screens where common functionality can be implemented.
